Title: The Observation Deck
ImagePrompt: A cracked glass window showing deep blue water and tiny bubbles
Description: The emergency lights are flickering. The sub is groaning under the pressure.

Title: Air Lock
ImagePrompt: A heavy metal circular door with a manual wheel lock
Description: The room is half-flooded. A heavy wrench sits at the bottom of the puddle.

Title: Engine Room
ImagePrompt: Massive humming turbines with sparks flying from a broken panel
Description: The core is overheating. You need to find a coolant leak fast.

Title: Storage Locker
ImagePrompt: Narrow shelves filled with rusted canisters and emergency kits
Description: Most of the supplies are ruined
Item: but a flare gun remains dry.

Title: The Trench
ImagePrompt: A dark underwater abyss visible through a porthole with bioluminescent fish
Description: The beauty of the glowing fish hides the danger of the deep.
